topicv3: Wildlife Resources m1327131 605,Ecotourism m1327362 589,Community Driven Development m1327662 732,Biodiversity m1326214 2084,Poverty Measurement and Analysis m1326941 707

abstracts.cdata!:
The grant funded activities covered the
            preparation of two reports-a biodiversity strategy and
            action plan (BSAP) and a national report. The BSAP component
            involved the formulation and adoption of strategies and
            actions necessary for the protection and sustainable use of
            the recipient's biodiversity, through a participatory
            process that includes public and private sectors and
            non-governmental organizations (NGOs). The national report
            component covered the full range of activities undertaken by
            the recipient in accordance with its obligations under the
            convention on biological diversity.
